_Type_
=== Declaration ===
<pre>
#include <pgm/pgm.h>

/`*` maximum length of GSI as a string `*`/
#define PGM_GSISTRLEN   (sizeof("000.000.000.000.000.000"))
#define PGM_GSI_INIT    {{ 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 }}

typedef struct pgm_gsi_t *pgm_gsi_t*;

struct pgm_gsi_t {
	char identifier`[`6`]`;
};
</pre>

=== Purpose ===
A globally unique source identifier (GSI).
